Package com.ibm.jikes.skij

This package contains the Skij Scheme interpreter, including classes that represent Scheme objects.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CompoundProcedure This class represents procedures defined in Scheme (nonprimitives).
Cons A Scheme pair.
Continuation A continuation is a procedure that represents an execution state captured via call-with-current-continuation.
Environment The abstract class representing Scheme environments.
EOFObject Implements the Scheme end-of-file object.
Evaluator This class handles the evaluation of Scheme expressions.
InputPort This implements Scheme input ports by acting as a wrapper around a Java reader.
ListenerConsole Start up a listener on the console (with its own thread).
ListenerWindow Start up a listener in an AWT window.
Macro The class for macro procedures.
Nil A singleton class that represents the Scheme empty list (nil).
OutputPort This implements Scheme output ports by acting as a wrapper around a Java writer.
PrimProcedure This abstract class represents primitve procedures (those implemented in Java).
Procedure Abstract class for procedures.
ProcEnvironment Environments for procedures (or any non-toplevel environment).
Scheme This class is used to start up Scheme as a standalone Java application.
SchemeListener Implements a listener (read-eval-print loop).
SchemeReader Provides hooks so you can define Java Readers in Skij.
SchemeTokenizer Implements a Scheme reader, not entirely satisfactorily.
SchemeWriter Provides hooks so you can define Java Writers in Skij.
Skijlet An applet that provides a Skij listener.
SkijTest  
Symbol The class for Scheme symbols.
TopEnvironment TopEnvironments represent the global binding environment.
 

Exception Summary
ContinuationException Used to restart a saved continuation.
SchemeException All exceptions in Skij.
 

Package com.ibm.jikes.skij Description

This package contains the Skij Scheme interpreter, including classes that represent Scheme objects.
